attributes.action:
Customer Service and call centre answering by a real person.
Charged at normal
attributes.additional_details: Peace of mind in the pace of modern life
attributes.background: Ensure phone calls are answered speedily without differing menu numbers to drive customers to distraction. Normal geographic or national rate numbers only. Firms not allowed to profit from their own mistakes/faults

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be an operational decision for individual companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
